question: Ghaznavid power was challenged in Khurasan and Khwarezm by which of the following kings?
explanation: Masud I was the son of Mahmud of Ghazni and ascended the throne in 1031 A.D. He was unable to preserve the power and integrity of the Ghaznavids. In Khurasan and Khwarezm, Ghaznavid power was challenged by the Seljuq Turks.
